Title: Relates to the age requirement for voting in a primary election
Summary: Relates to the age requirement for voting in a primary election; provides that a person who is seventeen years of age at the time of a primary election and who will be eighteen years of age at the time of the general election for which such primary election is held, shall be eligible to vote in such primary election.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the age requirement for voting in a primary election
